ValidationRule.description: RMA Reason required if RMA type is selected
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( RMA_Type__c , "Hardware"), ISPICKVAL( RMA_Type__c , "Software"), ISPICKVAL( RMA_Type__c , "Replacement"), ISPICKVAL( RMA_Type__c , "HWR"), ISPICKVAL( RMA_Type__c , "Shipping")), ISPICKVAL( RMA_Reasons__c , "") )
